sections.description: Simply Static Hosting is a little helper plugin to connect to simplystatic.io and provide a static version of your WordPress website in a matter of seconds.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • WPML/Polylang support
  • delete from single function
  • BunnyCDN with WP API instead of composer package
  • better restriction handling
  • config files in /uploads/
  • better UI cleanup
